subject: Simsonn HS Pro Shifter
description_text:
Hi

My wife ordered me a shifter from Amazon Uk and delivery was due on 12th Jan latest

The order number is 026-0447658-3988320

Any information as to when this will arrive would be greatly received as amazon shipping and Simsonn shipping show very different results.
Amazon states it shipped 30th December whereas your website shipping says the package is still yet to be picked up.

Regards

Phil L

conversations.body_text: Hi phil letchford,  We’re very sorry for the delay with your order. There was an angle deviation on a mid sheet-metal part for the HS Pro, so we asked the supplier to remake the parts, which caused the delay and a backlog of orders. We have now received the updated parts, production has resumed, and shipments have started going out. Thank you very much for your patience and understanding!

Thank you for the reply and updates.

Is there an ETA for arrival?
Has it been shipped yet?

Regards

Phil


Sent from Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
________________________________
